title: I have created a personal website. I want to add homepage content. Can someone give me ideas on what to write? I'm thinking to write 1000 words content. - Quora

response.answer_text: You have created a website, which means you've already decided on the topic you want to work on. Then you need to figure out what is the output that you want to share to the people through your website. Why are you writing this article? Who is your target audience? What is the main subject of the article? What are the main answers people are looking for in your content find that and write about it. Do the research regarding the topic and your questions that need to be answered Figure out these parameters and you will have your content!

You can write anything related to your life in your personal blog just like a diary. For example, you can write about YourselfYour school experienceYour college experienceYour achievementsYour day to day life happeningsYour hobbiesYour travel journeysAnything about youSee, I hope you're starting the personal blog as a hobby and not as a money making tool. If you want to make some good money you have to create a professional blog and if you just want to write your heart out and get some extra 50$-60$ every month, personal blog is good.
